title: Docs: add GIF demo in README and docs/home
body: Create a short screen recording of the CLI and dashboard and add it to README.md and docs/index.md. Place media in /assets.

title: Tool: add wikipedia search/fetch
body: Implement a new tool `wikipedia` with actions: search(query), page(title/id). Add docs and tests.

title: Tests: expand smoke tests for tools
body: Write unit tests covering web_search, python_exec (happy path + timeout), and vector_store add/query.

title: CI: add coverage report badge
body: Update CI to run coverage, upload to Codecov or produce a badge stored in docs (if Codecov not desired).

title: API: add /v1/health/details endpoint
body: Expose provider + model + enabled tools list at /v1/health/details. Add to docs.

title: Dashboard: loading skeleton and toast errors
body: Improve UX with a loading skeleton for result card and a simple toast on errors.

title: Memory: add namespaces support in CLI flags
body: Add a --namespace option to CLI and thread it to vector_store tool calls in examples.

title: Docs: add 'Architecture diagram (Mermaid) → PNG' in /assets
body: Export the Mermaid diagram to a PNG and embed in README/docs for social previews.

title: Packaging: publish to PyPI (hatch build)
body: Add a GitHub Action job (manual) to build and publish the package to TestPyPI, then PyPI.

title: Tool: add arXiv search (api via arxiv.org)
body: Implement a simple arXiv search tool (title/date/author filters) and summarize first N results.
